verses.verse: [A song of high degrees.] When God shall cause them of Sion that were led into captiuitie for to returne: we shalbe as men that dreamed.

Then shall our mouth be filled with a laughter: and our tongue with a ioyfull noyse. (126:3) Then shall suche as be amongst the Heathen say: God hath brought great thinges to passe, that he myght do for them.
(126:4) God hath brought great thinges to passe for vs: we be made merie.
(126:5) Make vs O God that be led into captiuitie: for to returne as riuers into the south.
(126:6) They that sowe in teares: shall reape in ioy.
(126:7) He that goeth foorth on his way, and wepyng beareth pretious seede: shall doubtlesse returning, come againe with a ioyfull noyse, bryngyng his sheaues with hym.
